SELECT t2.* FROM ( SELECT t1.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM ( SELECT fb.* FROM FP_Board fb, FP_Member fm WHERE fb.member_no = fm.member_no
AND fb.board_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND fb.board_content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND fm.member_nick LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
ORDER BY fb.board_no DESC ) t1 ) t2
WHERE t2.rnum >= (#{page}-1) * 10 + 1 AND t2.rnum <= #{page} * 10
SELECT * FROM FP_Board WHERE board_title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' ORDER BY board_no DESC
SELECT * FROM FP_Board WHERE board_content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%' ORDER BY board_no DESC
SELECT * FROM FP_Board WHERE member_no = #{member_no} ORDER BY board_no DESC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM FP_Board ORDER BY board_no DESC) b WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FP_Board fb, FP_Member fm
WHERE fb.board_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE fb.board_content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE fm.member_nick LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
